QuestData.Title: To Matters at Hand
QuestData.Description:
Ye need te get back te Zuldazar, Princess Talanji's people are in desperate need of help.
Now that ye got the heart, ye can absorb Azerite from all kinds of sources.
Use the teleporter pad behind ye te return te Zuldazar. I be disablin' it when yer done... no need te have the likes of Nathanos walkin' in here.
Just remember. Ye got the Heart of Azeroth around yer neck. Whatever happens... we must save the planet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Teleport Pad to return to Zuldazar
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Princess Talanji in Zuldazar.
